price: Àti pé, dájúdájú ègún ń bẹ lórí rẹ títí di Ọjọ́ ẹ̀san.”
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka al-laʿnata ilā yawmi al-dīni
